content: jazz up your wardrobe with this adorable crochet skirt featuring touchably soft caron simply soft this granny striped skirt comes to life in bold shades that you can easily customize to suit your style practice granny cluster stripes to complete the look show it off on its own or layer it over tights for a great winter outfit materials caron® simply soft™ 6 oz/170 g 315 yds/288 m sizes finished hip xs/s 37 94 cm m 40½ 103 cm l 44½ 122 cm xl 51 129 5 cm 2/3xl 56½ 143 5 cm 4/5xl 63 160 cm
